name: Rice Bran Oil
description: Rice Bran oil is truly like no other, it reins superior to other high fry oils due to its distinct nutty flavor that will not mask your food. Foods fried in Rice Bran Oil tend to cook up crisper and less greasy compared to other frying oils. Yield is also a distinguishing factor as it can be used 1.5-2 times longer than most oils in the market. With lower oxidation your cooking equipment will see less gunky buildup which means less time spent cleaning.

name: Pumpkin Seed Oil
description: Pumpkin seed oil has a rich aroma and full, earthy favour that lends it’s self to many applications. Try drizzling a bit of it onto a cheese plate with a slice of Gruyere, or into a pumpkin soup. Work a wee bit into cr?me fraische and adda dollop to borsht. Substitute a small portion of the baking oil in tea breads for pumpkin seed oil for a warm, toasty under note.

name: Kadoya 100% Pure Sesame Oil
description: This oil is amber in color. This Asian oil is full of flavor and great for seasoning and dressings.

name: Hazelnut Oil
description: The classic flavor of Hazelnuts is a must for the pastry kitchen. Create full-bodied nut pastry fillings, flavored ganache fillings for chocolates with hazelnut oil. Nut oils can be used in many applications where you would use extra virgin olive oil. Try using hazelnut oil in place of a small portion of the oil used in mayonnaise or in place of some of the oil used in a salad dressing.

name: Grapeseed Oil
description: Grapeseed oil is extracted from the seeds of grapes, typically wine grapes. Grapeseed oil is a byproduct of winemaking. After wine is made by pressing grapes, grape seeds are left behind. Grapeseed oil is extracted from these leftover grape seeds. Grapeseed oil is used as a natural beauty product. Its also marketed as a healthy alternative to vegetable oil.

name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Pure and light in all of its ways olive oil is the queen of all the oils with its subtle and most versatile characteristics. Olives are picked when they become plump and mature they are then artisanally extracted to obtain the precious oil on the inside.

name: Crushed Organic Meyer Lemon Olive Oil
description: Organic Meyer Lemons are crushed together with fresh hand-harvested California Mission olives to make this amazing extra virgin olive oil. Small batches & love. The flavor essential of Northern California. Add excitement to steamed vegetables, arugula salads, pasta & parmesan. Simply beautiful over heirloom tomatoes.

name: Crushed Organic Blood Orange Olive Oil
description: Organic Moro blood oranges crushed together with fresh California olives. Made by hand in small batches. A delicate hint of fresh raspberries. An O original since 1996. Deliciously versatile. Splash over deli-roasted chicken to liven up the flavors. Perfect drizzled over Fall vegetables, roasted duck or chops & wild rice. Beautiful with blue cheese & butter lettuce. Winner of both Silver and Gold at the International Specialty Food Show in NYC.

name: Avocado Oil
description: Like olive oil, avocado oil is one of few vegetable oils not derived from seeds; it is pressed from the fleshy pulp surrounding the avocado pit, As a culinary oil, avocado oil compares well with olive oil.

name: Almond Oil
description: This oil boasts a fresh, roasted almond flavor. It reveals subtle nuances when combined with other ingredients. Its delicate character makes it a good substitute for olive oil in cases where walnut oil and hazelnut oil are just too powerful. When combined with any salad, fish or vegetable dish, almond oil helps to fashion a gourmet meal. Almond oil is very popular in India with duck and curry, and in China it is also used with chicken and duck.

name: Lemon EVOO Spray
description: Mantova Spray Lemon Extra Virgin Olive Oil is an all natural product that has a great balance of lemon and extra virgin olive oil flavor. This non-stick cooking spray contains no artificial ingredients, preservatives, or anti-foaming agents. With the special spray bottle, the EVOO is protected from oxygen and does no contain aerosol and other unhealthy additives. It is great for managing the amount of oil used. Great for salads, meats or any cooking needs!

name: Ghee Butter Spray
description: Mantova Ghee Oil Spray offers a convenient way to use this traditional butter in your kitchen using a unique chemical free spray bottle. Ghee is a form of cultured and clarified butter that can be used in place of oils and butter in many recipes. Ghee has a high smoke point and can be used in food preparation with high temperatures without the risk of burning the oil and charring the food. This cultured, clarified and shelf-stable natural butter spray has a smoother nutty flavor and is extremely rich, imparting decadence into the meal.

name: Garlic EVOO Spray
description: Mantova Spray Garlic Extra Virgin Olive Oil is an all natural product that has a great balance of garlic and extra virgin olive oil flavor from Mantova, Italy. This non-stick cooking spray contains no artificial ingredients, preservatives, or anti-foaming agents. With the special spray bottle, the Garlic EVOO is protected from oxygen and does not contain aerosol and other unhealthy additives. It is great for managing the amount of oil used. Great for salads, meats or any cooking needs!

name: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Spray
description: Mantova Spray Extra Virgin Olive Oil is an all natural product that has a great flavor, it combines the convenience of a spray oil with high quality extra virgin olive oil from Mantova, Italy. This non-stick cooking spray contains no artificial ingredients, preservatives or anti-foaming agents. With the special spray bottle the EVOO is protected from oxygen and does not contain aerosol and other unhealthy additives. It is great for managing the amount of oil used. Great for salads, meats or any cooking needs!

name: Black Truffle EVOO Spray
description: Mantova Spray Truffle Extra Virgin Olive Oil is an all natural product that has a great balance of truffle and extra virgin olive oil flavor from Mantova, Italy. This non-stick cooking spray contains no artificial ingredients, preservatives, or anti-foaming agents. With the special spray bottle, the EVOO is protected from oxygen and does not contain aerosol and other unhealthy additives. It is great for managing the amount of oil used. Great for salads, meats or any cooking needs

name: White Verjus
description: Verjus is an acidic liquid that is made from unripe green grapes. It has a mild acidity and is a staple in French cuisine. It is an extremely versatile ingredient that will enhance poultry, game, fish, seafood, stews, marinades, sauces and even salads. Use it as a marinade. It is also used to heighten flavor in the same manner that lemon or vinegar would be used. It is perfect for salad dressings and as a pan deglazer.
extra_data: {"caseCount":6,"shelfstable":"Store in a cool dry place","origin":"Boulou Spain"}

name: White Balsamic Vinegar
description: White Balsamic has the same subtle, sweet flavor as the more widely available classic dark brown balsamic vinegar. It is light with a delicate aftertaste and pure clean color. This vinegar has the advantage over the classic variety in that it can be served with lighter colored foods without discoloring them. It can be included in salad dressings, marinades, and pale-coloured sauces. Try a small amount with fish, chicken or roasted vegetables to add a bright extra flavor.

name: Tomato Vinegar
description: A flavor reminiscent of dried tomatoes

name: Sotaroni Sweet Pedro Ximenez Vinegar, Gran Reserva
description: This is an exceptional quality vinegar that has been aged for 25 years. It boosts a strong mahogany colour, soft sweet and sour flavor and a thicker and more surrounding density.

name: Sotaroni – 12 Year Sweet Pedro Ximénez Vinegar
description: Derived from the Pedro Ximénez grape, known also for producing sumptuous wine. Cultivated in the warm climate and moist soil of Southern Spain and gathered in a late season harvest, these grapes are lovingly simmered into a semi sweet vinegar which rests in American antique oak barrels for 12 years to steep and soak in subtle flavors. It is very aromatic, boasting fruity notes with traces of figs and dates.

name: Sherry Wine Vinegar Reserve
description: Sherry vinegar is made from Sherry wines, using the tradtional criadera and soleras process of transferring vinegars from barrel to barrel over years. Dark amber in color, with a smooth, light-bodied consistency. Complex, with notes of fig, almond and oak tempering the bright acid. Great alternative to balsamic vinegar that should be a pantry staple. Use it in vinaigrettes in a place of red wine vinegar. Add a splash to gazpacho or rich, meat laden stews that need a hit of acid.
extra_data: {"caseCount":6,"shelfstable":"Store in a dark cool dry place","origin":"Spain"}

name: Sherry Wine Vinegar
description: This sherry vinegar is sold in a convenient 5 litre size. Stir a spoonful of sherry vinegar to light soups and broths to give a lift and bring out flavor. Use it to create an intense vinaigrette. A few drops on each side of a steak after it comes off the BBQ to complement and enhance. Sprinkle onto salads, roasted vegetables or cheese sparingly. Add a swirl to chilled summer gazpacho.

name: Sherry Wine Vinegar
description: Sherry vinegar is made from Sherry wines, using tradtional criaderas and soleras process of transferring vinegars from barrel to varrel over years. Dark amber in color, with a smooth, light-bodied consistency. Complex with notes of fig, almond and oak tempering the bright acid. Great alternative to balsamic vinegar that should be a pantry staple. Use it in vinaigrettes in place of red wine vinegar. Add a splash to gazpacho or rich, meat laden stews that need a hit of acid.

name: Reggio Emilia Silver Balsamic Vinegar
description: Traditional and exceptional vinegar from the town of Reggio Emilia near Modena Italy aged 18 years. Extremely compex and sweet taste, unique and flavorful aroma with an exceptional syrupy consistency. Traditional Balsamic Vinegar of Reggio emilia comes with a beautiful beige color gift box which makes the product a perfect gift to give or to be given.
extra_data: {"caseCount":"1 each","shelfstable":"Store in a cool dry place","origin":""}

name: Reggio Emilia Red Balsamic Vinegar
description: Traditional and exceptional vinegar from the town of Reggio Emilia near Modena Italy aged 12 years. Extremely complex and sweet taste, unique and flavorful aroma with an exceptional syrupy consistency. Traditional Balsamic Vinegar of Reggio Emilia comes with a beautiful beige color gift box which makes the product a perfect gift or to be given.
extra_data: {"caseCount":"1 each","shelfstable":"Store in a cool dry place","origin":""}

name: Red Verjus
description: Verjus is the tart, fresh juice of unripe wine grapes. It is a culinary ingredient indigenous to the world’s wine producing regions that is used in sauce making, for poaching fish and meat, and to dress lettuces, vegetables and fruit. Verjus or “verjuice” as it is sometimes called, literally means green juice in the sense that it’s made from fruit that has yet to fully ripen. It is used to add acidity to foods, an important component in food and in cooking.
extra_data: {"caseCount":6,"shelfstable":"Store in a cool dry place","origin":"Boulou Spain"}

name: Raspberry Vinegar
description: Raspberry vinegar became a culinary sensation in the 1980’s, and it’s popularity has not flagged since. It is commonly used in salad dressings, but try tossing root vegetables in raspberry vinegar and kosher salt and roasting with a joint of lamb. Also, add brightness to glazed fruits, pureed vegetables, and exciting nuances to pickles and preserves.

name: Pedro Ximenez Sherry Wine
description: Sherry wine produces a particularly full-bodied, well-rounded vinegar. Top quality sherry vinegars are rich and strong, sharp and refreshing. These vinegars hold the nutty base notes of the sherry wine, as well as traces of oak and caramel, toasted almonds and coffee.

name: Organic Apple Cider Glaze
description: Mantova Organic Unfiltered Apple Cider Vinegar Glaze from Mantova, Italy is a great addition to a healthy diet. Fortunately it’s easy to follow an apple cider vinegar diet because there are many way to incorporate it into your daily regimen.

name: La Saba Vinocotto
description: Sweet reduction of the grape must used to make balsamic vinegar. Reduced to about one-third of its original volume, and aged for 2 years in chestnut and oak barrels, creating a syrup like consistency. Very versatile product, bringing a sweet balsamic flavor to meat, fish, vegetables, and desserts.
extra_data: {"caseCount":6,"shelfstable":"Store in a cool dry place","origin":"Nigris Italy"}

name: Classic Vincotto
description: The Vincotto is a condiment that is obtained from two different kinds of grapes: Negroamaro and Malvasia Nera. The Vincotto is an elixir sweet and and velvety with delicate harmonious flavors of spices, grapes and plums. The grapes are left to dry on the vines and afterwards on wooden trellises. The very thick product is obtained and poured into small oak barrels together and aged in the barrels for over years to develope all the flavors. No additives, preservatives or dyes are used. The Vincotto is a very versatile seasoning, it can be used as a condiment giving a more delicious tang to roasted meats, vegetables, fruit salads and sweets.

name: Cider Vinegar
description: Pure apple cider vingear, great for a wide range of culinary applications and all around pratical uses.

name: Champagne Vinegar – Beaufor
description: Delightfully tart, bright and sweet vinegar crafted from grapes grown in Reims, France’s Champagne region.

name: Banyuls France
description: Banyuls is one of France’s famous vins doux and it is made principally from the grenache grapes that grow in and aroundthe harsh arid region where France joins Spain on the Mediterranean coast. The vinegar that is made from this wine is aged for five years in oak casks and retains all of the wine’s qualitites, with hints of nuts, licorice, coffee, orange peel and vanilla.

name: Aged Premium Balsamic Vinegar
description: A rich, complex sweetness that explodes in the mouth with notes of fig, molasses, cherry, chocolate, or prune. Traditional balsamic should pick up the flavors of the wood it matured in, and may have a slight smokiness. Traditional balsamic offers a mellow tartness rather than a strong acidity. Traditional balsamic vinegar is glossy, viscous, and dark brown, though it captures light beautifully. It moves like syrup, and has a velvety texture on the tongue.
